div.div:
Get Hall State
Convert to Angle
Update Running Estimates

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

div.div:
Advance one step in position Estimate
Update ThreePhase Driver

switch.text:
Advance one step in position Estimate
Update ThreePhase Driver

div.div:
called at regular interval
Gets latest position estimate
Do appropriate phase advance
Command ThreePhaseDriver
